title: ∑x Equation
text: ∑x $$=$$ (n)(μₓ) + $$z \sqrt{n}$$ σₓ, where $$x$$ is one value from the original unknown population, $$n$$ is the sample size, μₓ is the mean of X, $$z$$ is is $$z-score$$, and σₓ is the standard deviation of X.
